description: This file defines functions related to game state management, including initializing the default game state, saving to local storage, and loading from local storage for a browser-based game. It references types and utilizes localStorage APIs.

methods.name: defaultGameState
methods.description: Returns a default initialized game state object with default player, level, score, checkpoint, and paused status.

methods.name: saveGame
methods.description: Serializes the game state object and saves it to local storage under a specific key.

methods.name: loadSave
methods.description: Retrieves the game state from local storage, parses it, and returns it; returns null if storage is empty or an error occurs.
